addr: 240 East 39 Street Apartment 52C New York, New York 10016
title: IIBN New York: An Evening with Sean Lyons
desc: We are delighted to invite you to attend an evening with Sean Lyons, President of R/GA USA, hosted by the Consul General of Ireland, Barbara Jones at the Consulate Residence on December 8th from 6pm to 8pm Sean has recently rejoined R/GA as President of R/GA USA having spent the past two years as Global Chief Digital Officer at Havas Worldwide.? Prior to that Sean?joined R/GA as an executive technical director back in April 0f 2005, working his way up to group director and then managing director before leaving for Havas in the spring of 2013. During his first tenure with the agency, Sean?led the Nike account as managing director, managing internal and production teams across the agency?s New York, San Francisco and London offices.? ? Before joining R/GA, Sean?founded consultancy CLR Media, where he worked with clients including WPP PR firm Burson-Marsteller and Barneys New York. That followed over three years with Silicon Valley agency Oven Digital as director of rich media, working on web development for clients including Tiffany & Co. and IBM. ? This is a member?s only event with numbers and space limited! ?Register now to avoid any disappointments! ? We are ever grateful to the Consulate General of Ireland for their support and for hosting this event at the Residence ? 240 East 39th?Street, Apt 52C (between 2nd?& 3rd?Avenues), New York, NY 10016.
